spiritsExplanation:
The workout video "30 MIN MORNING PILATES || Energising Full Body Workout (Moderate)" has strong indicators of the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit. The title and tags emphasize terms like "morning pilates" and "energising," which suggest smooth, continuous movement patterns and a focus on mind-body connection, typical of Pilates. The channel's background in dance and consistent references to rhythm further bolster this classification, leading to a high score of 0.9 for this spirit.

The "Structured & Disciplined" spirit is also evident due to the methodical nature of Pilates, which involves precise movements and technique. This is supported by comments praising the instructor's "concise instruction" and "variety," leading to a score of 0.7.

"Soothing & Restorative" receives a moderate score of 0.5. Although not the primary focus, the comments and the gentle nature of Pilates, along with the words "well-deserved child's pose," suggest elements of relaxation and stress reduction. The absence of high-intensity cues excludes the "High-Energy & Intense" spirit and the indoor setting eliminates potential for "Outdoor & Adventure." "Sport & Agility" was not considered relevant due to the non-competitive and technique-focused nature of Pilates.
